repositories.author: addy-dclxvi
repositories.name: i3-starterpack
repositories.description: A simple guide (and example of configuration) to install i3 & its and essentials packages, then make them look eye candy.

repositories.author: jimsalterjrs
repositories.name: sanoid
repositories.description: Policy-driven snapshot management and replication tools. Using ZFS for underlying next-gen storage. (Btrfs support plans are shelved unless and until btrfs becomes reliable.) Primarily intended for Linux, but BSD use is supported and reasonably frequently tested.

repositories.author: major
repositories.name: MySQLTuner-perl
repositories.description: MySQLTuner is a script written in Perl that will assist you with your MySQL configuration and make recommendations for increased performance and stability.

repositories.author: Logitech
repositories.name: slimserver
repositories.description: Server for Logitech Squeezebox players. This server is also called Logitech Media Server

repositories.author: get-iplayer
repositories.name: get_iplayer
repositories.description: A utility for downloading TV and radio programmes from BBC iPlayer
